reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! Her lectures are engaging, and she genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Great professor, but the material can be tough. He explains concepts well, though you need to put in the effort.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson knows her stuff, but her exams are really challenging. Be prepared to study hard.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Lectures are a bit dry, and the grading is tough. Not my favorite class.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is incredible! She makes complex topics easy to understand and always encourages discussion.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Good professor with clear explanations. The labs are a bit time-consuming, but overall a solid class.

reviews.subject: American Literature
reviews.review: The reading load is heavy, and Dr. Williams expects a lot from students. Be ready to work.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Professor Brown is the best! His lectures are interesting, and he’s always available to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is great at explaining difficult concepts. The exams are fair but require thorough preparation.

reviews.subject: Philosophy 101
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Professor Anderson can be hard to follow at times. The discussions are engaging, though.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. White is passionate about the subject and it shows in her teaching. Highly recommend taking her class.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Solid professor who makes a challenging subject manageable. The assignments are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Dr. Moore is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit monotone. The labs are well-organized, though.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Not a fan of Professor Clark’s teaching style. The lectures feel rushed and not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Nelson is fantastic! She’s clear, concise, and makes sure everyone understands the material.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Professor Edwards is very knowledgeable, and his assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. King is wonderful! Her passion for art is contagious, and her lectures are a joy to attend.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting material, but Professor Hall’s grading can be harsh. Be prepared to defend your arguments.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Dr. Baker is very approachable and helpful. The class is tough, but she does a great job explaining everything.

reviews.subject: English Composition
reviews.review: Not my favorite class. Professor Carter’s feedback is vague, and the assignments feel a bit repetitive.
